c: ^Kay: Yeah, just had to deal with usual beratement from 'rents -
^Kay: I forgot to do the dishes so I'm a terrible person or some shit like that.
^Kay: Yeah, I just took my time getting here.
^Kay: I forget sometimes that this town is kinda pretty.
^Vanya: Yeah but we've seen it all a million times. Does that mean it's still pretty?
^Kay: Yeah, not gonna lie I did not want to leave my room.
^Kay: I had a pretty perfect summer malaise going on; any longer and I was going to get eaten by the couch.
^Vanya: I get that! I've been watching "American Ninja Warrior" non-stop, just 'cos there's nothing else on.

g-0: ^Vanya: Over at the tower. Let's go see what's up.

I_i_Kay_to_Vanya_repeat: ^Vanya: Halle's over at the lifeguard tower, let's go see what's up!

I_i_All_main: ^Kay: Nothing much - What have you guys been up to?
^Halle: I watched "The Avengers" for the 18th time today - I'm convinced it's a film without flaws.
^Vanya: Oh yo so a guy came into the Gas N' Go today after filling up - bought a Snickers and a single lottery ticket, right?
^Vanya: He won ten grand and I wanted to suplex him for it SO BAD.
^Halle: You're too loud to be a fugitive.
^Kay: What would you do with the cash?
^Kay: If you won $10,000 right now, bam, in your wallet, no questions asked.
^Halle: Well first off, after taxes it's probably more like eight grand, so keep that in mind-
^Halle: So given EIGHT grand what would you do?
^Halle: I'd invest it - it's not much but it'd become something by the time I'm like, forty.
^Kay: New phone, new clothes, laptop, bass guitar. All the essentials.
^Vanya: I don't have a bank account, so I'd stuff it into my mattress and never tell my parents.
^Halle: How the hell do you still not have a bank account?
^Vanya: Hey I don't wanna deal with that. I get paid in cash and it goes under my sleeping butt where it belongs.
^Halle: Okay what about a MILLION dollars-
^Kay: Your mattress would be very lumpy and I don't know how you'd hide that from your parents.
^Vanya: My mattress would be full of LIES.
^Kay: I dunno man, there isn't really space for big dreams nowadays.
^Vanya: I try not to think about that stuff.
^Kay: Let's get out of here. This shit's too picturesque.
^Halle: I'm the only one with a car...
^Vanya: Perfect! This works out so well.
I_i_All_repeat: ^Halle: I'm with you. Let's get out of here. My car's in the lot up the path.
I_i_fail: ^Halle: Oh hey, Kay. Vanya was looking for you. You lose her on the way?

I_ii_All: ^Halle: This place is about as dead as it gets.
^Vanya: It sucks that the cinema got the emergency exits fixed so we couldn't sneak in during trailers.
^Kay: It sucks that the cinema closed.
^Kay: Yeah. One less thing to do around here, and the list was getting pretty short already.
^Halle: Speaking of shit to do, Vanya did you hear anything?

g-0: ^Vanya: Oh! Yeah he said there's a thing happening at Kelly Fleming's place.
^Halle: I forget, which one are you dating? Both their names start with "C" and teenage boys are really interchangeable.

c: ^Vanya: But I've been on dates with Cam.
^Kay: And you've made out with both.
^Halle: Are THEY aware of this overlap?
^Vanya: Uhh, no. I WANT to tell them! But I've never found the right time.
^Vanya: But I've been on dates with Cody.
^Kay: And you've made out with both.
^Halle: Are THEY aware of this overlap?
^Vanya: Uhh, no. I WANT to tell them! But I've never found the right time.
^Vanya: It was an accident! I started hanging with Cody, then I started hanging with Cam, and I like them both a lot!
^Halle: Right, that's cool, but are THEY aware of this overlap?

g-1: ^Vanya: Look, it's fine! I'll figure it out.
^Halle: Are they both going to the party?

c: ^Kay: (Did she just say what I think she did?)

g-2: ^Halle: Yeah that might become important soon.
^Halle: Now we HAVE to go to this party.
^Halle: I also am also in the mood to get drunk and cause problems in the company of people I hate.
^Halle: We can't hang out in the Liberty Plaza parking lot forever.
^Kay: I dare you to come up with a good reason why.
^Halle: It'll be fine! You'll be fine. We just gotta get this
^ across town to the sub-division from hell.
^Vanya: Halle don't blame the car, you're a really bad driver.

driving_fail: ^Halle: And my car is busted! My parents are gonna be pissed!
^Halle: The Department of Public Works! The potholes in this town are insane!
driving_pass: ^Halle: Oh shush, we were just fine. I am an excellent driver.
main: ^Halle: So Vanya you're off to choose your boyfriend?
^Vanya: I guess so? Ugh this is gonna suck no matter what huh.
^Kay: It might? It might also go super well and you have two life-long friendships, both of whom you got to make out with at different times.
^Kay: More likely yeah it gets awkward as fuck.
^Kay: Are you planning some kind of mischief?
^Halle: I'm in a mischief mood, yeah.
^Halle: Hey everyone says I should learn how to drink BEFORE I go to college, so why not?
^Halle: What are you going to do?
^Kay: Uhh I'm just going to hang out.
^Kay: I dunno. I'm not feeling up to this.
^Vanya: Give it a shot? Just go in for a bit, see if you like it.
^Kay: Alright, I'll go in for a few minutes.

II_ii_Halle_to_Kelly: ^Kelly: I uhh, don't remember inviting you?
^Kelly: I mean you're welcome to hang out, I just didn't think this was your scene.
^Halle: It usually isn't, but I heard about it through the grape-vine and couldn't resist. Not a hell of a lot happening this summer.
^Kelly: You doing anything cool this summer?
^Kelly: Yeah. Umm, listen. Just- just don't start anything alright? I'm just trying to have a cool party.
^Halle: I don't know what you could possibly be referring to.
II_ii_Halle_to_BeerPong: ^Halle: Oh HELL yes I will take on anyone at beer pong!
^Halle: Come play beer pong! We were friends that one time!
^Kelly: I'm not going to say no, but I want you to know I am apprehensive about this arrangement.
^Halle: And that's why no one likes you anymore.

b: ^Kelly: Yeah, and you drank all the beer.
^Halle: YUP. Why would I split this nectar?
^Kelly: And yet you drank all the beer!
^Halle: YUP. Why would I waste all this nectar?
^Halle: Ok, so I'm not the greatest at playing beer pong.
^Halle: I don't *hiccup* need this from you.

Beer_Poing_Result: ^Halle: Is this not ze poiint of partiess?
^Halle: I kinda gotta drink a bunch to survive being in the same room as YOU people.
^Kelly: If you hate us so much, why the hell do you feel you've got to show up and make such a big deal of being here?
^Kelly: Seriously, this is like your THING.
^Halle: Why yes, yes it is. Let's play another round.
II_iii_Vanya: ^Vanya: Well shit. Guess it's now or never.
^Vanya: Cody is with his friends, the lovable lug, and Cody is over in the corner because he's a beautiful loner.
^Vanya: I have to choose between two super cute boys UGH THIS SUCKS.

II_iii_Vanya_to_Cody_main: ^Cody: HEYYY V! What's up?? Me and the guys were just about to learn how to shotgun a beer! Wanna join?
^Vanya: That's not- nevermind, YES I wanna- WAIT.

c: ^Vanya: On second thought, I'll be right back!
^Vanya: On second thought, I'll be right back!

choose_cody: ^Vanya: Cody, can I talk to you about something?
^Cody: Yeah, of course! What's up? Everything okay?
^Vanya: Yeah! No things are... great actually. Like with you, things are great when I'm around you.
^Vanya: You're brash and irresponsible and smoking hot but like also you make me feel wanted and that's cool and stuff.
^Cody: Well that's cos you are wanted.
^Cody: I know I'm reckless and sometimes a danger to those around me, but that's because I wanna live life right now, you know?
^Cody: All this? Partying at Kelly's house, hanging with three different guys named Jay, driving my mom's minivan home at 3AM before getting up at 6AM for the gym?
^Cody: That stuff ain't forever, you know?
^Cody: I think of my outward masculinity as a veneer that'll fall away as I get further into college,
^Cody: and figure out I'm gonna get a job wearing a suit or some shit like that. But for now it's really fun!
^Cody: Thanks man! I'm trying. My head hurts.
^Vanya: I really appreciate you being so honest with me.
^Cody: Thanks for listening! That was a new and frightening level of mental clarity.
^Vanya: So like, would you like to be my... boyfriend?
^Cody: I've never identified as one of those before. Sounds good to me!
^Vanya: OH HEY CAM. WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
^Cam: I told you I'd be here? At the party I texted you to tell you about?
^Cody: Yo! I also texted her about it and told her to come!
^Cam: I get the feeling there's something going on between you two?

II_iii_Vanya_to_Cam_main: ^Cam: Hey you! Thank goodness you showed up, I was maximum three minutes from quitting life.
^Cam: I know nOBODY at this party. This ain't exactly my crowd.
^Cam: But it's really good to see your face - it's been a while!
^Vanya: Yeah, sorry about that. Things have been busy at the Gas N' Go, or with the usual suspects.
^Cam: That's cool! It's summer, you wanna hang with your friends!
^Vanya: Yeah. Hey, I've got something I wanna talk to you about.

c: ^Vanya: On second thought, I'll be right back!

II_iii_Vanya_to_Cam_repeat: ^Vanya: Yeah. Hey, I've got something I wanna talk to you about.

c: ^Vanya: On second thought, I'll be right back!

b: ^Vanya: Well, we've been dating for like, a few months, but I guess I don't know where you're at on... liking me.
^Cam: Oh! I like you! Lots! Obviously! Do I not make that obvious?
^Vanya: Well, I mean it's hard to tell what you like, cos you don't like a lot of stuff.
^Cam: Just 'cos I hate the world doesn't mean I hate you!
^Vanya: Well, we've been making out for a bit and like having moody conversations until sunrise and stuff, but we haven't been on a proper "date" yet,
^Vanya: and I was wondering if that was because you maybe didn't like me THAT way, even though I like you a... different way.

choose_cam: ^Vanya: Well either way I just wanted to ask if you'd want to become a bit more... serious.
^Vanya: Yeah! Like I could come over to your place before midnight and maybe meet your parents and like we could see a movie some time? A real date and everything?
^Cam: Uhh... sure! If that's what you want! Is that what... people do?
^Cam: I guess I don't get why we would become some kind of "item" going into senior year of high school?

c: ^Cam: Yeah but that doesn't mean we have to be so "official", or that it's a good idea to pile on expectations and stuff.
^Cam: I guess I'm just not sure that's what I want?
^Vanya: Because why not? I want to be able to like, kiss you in the hall and hang out and not sneak around all the time.
^Vanya: I bet your mom would like me if she met me.
^Cam: I'm not sure my mom likes ANYONE when she first meets them.
^Vanya: Well that's a completely seperate stituation that might explain some things,
^Vanya: but there's still no way to know unless we try.

g-1: ^Vanya: OH HEY CODY. WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
^Cody: I told you I'd be here? At the party I texted you to tell you about?
^Cam: I also texted her about it and told her to come!
^Cody: I get the feeling I'm intruding on a moment.

II_iv_main: ^Kay: Fuck that. There's no way I can stay in there without freaking the fuck out.
^Drunk Party-Goer: Hey, you get fucked up too quick? Gotta learn how to drink, girl!
^Drunk Party-Goer: Hey, don't freak out at me if you can't handle your shit, right?
^Matt: Hey, why don't you give fucking off 155% a shot?
^Drunk Party-Goer: Woah boy, singer-songwriter Matt Fenster appears!
^Drunk Party-Goer: Your sentence structure sucks, by the way - am I fucking off 155%, or am I giving fucking off 155% of "a shot", because either way-
^Drunk Party-Goer: You don't appear to be drunk but instead very distraught. I want none of this.

Talk_to_matt: ^Matt: Hey, are you okay? You do seem "distraught".
^Kay: I, I just- yeah. Having a moment. Anxiety thing. It's a thing. It happens.
^Matt: You're having a panic attack? Do you want to chill out for a bit?
^Matt: It's definitely been a couple of years since we've chatted.
^Matt: I think last time we had class together was in what, 8th grade chemistry? Mr. W, who had a "bang head here" sign?
^Kay: The VP was on my ass about running in the halls, so I ran into Mr. W's room and used the sign until a bunch of teachers dragged me away from it into ISS.
^Kay: Yeah I don't know if you know, but I kinda turned into an asshole.
^Matt: I mean I'd heard it, but you could've totally lied to me and I would've believed you. Way to goof that up.
^Matt: I was always under the impression you weren't like an asshole, more just... surrounded by them? Oh man that's not what I mean, I mean-
^Matt: I mean you fell in with a weird crowd? Oh shit I'm sounding like an after-school special.

c: ^Kay: They may be assholes, but they're my assholes. We stick together.
^Kay: No one else around here really likes us, so we found each other and that's worked out pretty decently since.
^Kay: They're not- we're not assholes. We just stick together, and don't feel like censoring ourselves so people like us.

g-0: ^Kay: Sort of. it's pretty hard to explain.

c: ^Kay: Uhh, well if I have an attack it's like someone turned on a faucet and stuck my head in it? Like everything, every little thing, is just way too much.
^Kay: You want there just to be an "off" switch for literally the entire world, but 'cos there isn't, instead you kinda end up just shutting yourself off.
^Kay: It's pretty exhausting. My brain is always running at 100% doing like, simulations of all the bad shit that could happen. It would be impressive if it didn't suck so much.
^Kay: It's like being the Hulk, but not green or strong or cool in any way? I'm just a raw nerve, super exposed and everyone, even if they don't know it, is jabbing at me with like, a dinner fork.

g-1: ^Matt: Have you been like, checked out for this?
^Kay: Nope. Then they'd give me pills and I wouldn't feel anything and that freaks me out way more.
^Matt: I kinda assumed you were "too cool" and "detached" for this kinda stuff.

c: ^Kay: Yeah well, everyone getshanded a stereotype and I never fought mine.
^Kay: If no one thinks they can get a rise out of you then they won't even try.
^Kay: Well that sucks, 'cos like we probably could've been friends BEFORE I was out here having a fucking freak out.
^Kay: There are a bunch of people that would probably be rad to talk to, but they all think I don't give a shit.
^Kay: Literally nobody is "too cool" or "detached" for this kinda stuff. Everyone's got something.

g-2: ^Kay: Fuck why am I dumping this all on you, I just met you like ten minutes ago.
^Matt: We already knew each other! Maybe not this deep, but we knew each other.
^Kay: Still, you're not exactly in my inner circle - I don't usually tell people stuff like this.
^Matt: I'm glad you did. It seems like it's helping.
^Kay: I don't get to usually talk this stuff out.

b: ^Cody: I mean yeah, it's been a thing for a bit, we've just kept on the down-low.
^Cam: Nope! I just feel like an unknowing accomplice, 'cos me and Vanya have been hooking up for a bit.
^Cam: If I had known I wouldn't have, man!

s1: ^beat the shit out of each other

b: ^Cam: I mean I don't think we were going to? Were we?
^Cody: Nah, I wasn't gonna get physical.
^Cam: Well I greatly appreciate that because I would've lost.
^Cody: Yeah, we weren't gonna fight cos neither of us really did anything wrong - Vanya you lied to both of us, and cheated on me.
^Cody: Yeah, it's freshly official, I guess!
^Cam: Well that's problematic, cos we've been dating for 3 months.
^Cam: Have you guys been hooking up?!

s1: ^beat the shit out of each other

b: ^Cam: I mean I don't think we were going to? Were we?
^Cody: Nah, I wasn't gonna get physical.
^Cam: Yeah, we weren't gonna fight cos neither of us really did anything wrong - Vanya you lied to both of us, and cheated on me.
^Cody: I mean yeah, it's been a thing for a bit, we've just kept on the down-low.
^Cam: Well that's problematic, cos we've been dating for 3 months.
^Vanya: aww hey you remembered our anniversary- I MEAN.
^Cam: A.k.a you cheated on BOTH of us.

III_ii_Result: ^Cam: I'm not entirely sure that suffices here, Vanya.
^Cody: Yeah man I kinda gotta agree. Cam, you wanna hang out?

b: ^Cody: Yeah, for sure. Just, you gotta think about stuff first.
^Cam: Maybe. I gotta cool off for a bit.

III_iii_Int: ^Halle: Woahhhh there, alright alright, I'm going.
^Kelly: What the fuck is your PROBLEM, Halle?
^Kelly: I let you in because we've known each other since we were in elementary school, but you are a TOTAL bitch now!
^Kelly: You don't get to show up, get drunk, break my mom's vase, and then call us "phonies" like you're some Goth version of Holden Caulfield!
^Halle: I'm super totally not at all Goth.
^Kelly: You wanna be way cooler than the rest of us,
^Kelly: You want to be smart and aloof and go into the military instead of college and shit,
^Kelly: But you just want us all to pay attention to you.
^Kelly: Get out, stay out, or I'll beat you up or something. Ugh.
^Vanya: I dunno, seems like you went too far this time.
^Vanya: Jeezuz, Halle. That's a bit much. What'd she do?
^Vanya: She's over there, hanging out with Matt.
^Halle: Let's go grab her, we're going home.
III_iii_Halle_To_Kay: ^Halle: Kay let's go. We're going home.
^Kay: What? It's a bit early, isn't it?
^Halle: What do you care? You didn't even want to come.
^Kay: Yeah, I really didn't, and we did anyways, and then I got here and had a fucking anxiety attack-
^Halle: You always freak out when we show up to shit like this, and have "panic attacks"-
^Halle: Yeah, there were - Kay is a total drama queen and doesn't know how to like, breathe and chill-
^Matt: Woah, that's not fair, that's super uncool-
^Kay: Halle, you NEVER listen to me or take what I want, or even what Vanya wants, into consideration,
^Kay: And it's really not okay for you to just say like "breathe" or "chill out" when I say I'm having a moment.
^Matt: I have no idea what you're talking about, but me too.
^Kay: I'm going to hang out with Matt.
^Matt: I can, uhh, give her a ride home.

b: ^Vanya: With what car? Your ride is busted.
^Vanya: And I don't have a license, so.

III_iii_Halle_To_Kay: ^Vanya: Yeah, you probably shouldn't be in control of anything right now.
